alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Pontotoc (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 16 at 2:46PM CST until February 16 at 3:15PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CST FOR CHICKASAW AND PONTOTOC COUNTIES... At 245 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Randolph to near Clarkson, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pontotoc, Houston, Trace State Park, Ecru, Pyland, Troy, Trebloc, Furrs, Houlka, Sherman, New Houlka, Algoma, Woodland, Endville, Cherry Creek, Thorn, Chiwapa, Pannell, Thelma and McCondy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for northeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
